name: Lovestar
description:
Here it is! The rumored Lodestar visual novel!

This is just a demo of an idea that me and @Toppleng had and decided to run with!

The full roster is 8 characters but the Valentines Day demo has 4!

There are a total of 10 endings you can get!

Ren'py Web Supporter has some graphical issues, it doesn't like to load images, and all of the movies had to be changed to individual images sequenced together.

Controls:
